reviews.review_msg: Dr. Mehri is an amazing teacher and I am very happy I took this class. You will not find a more knowledgeable, caring, and genuine teacher anywhere else. Most of the class's grade comes from quizzes, which can be retaken as many times as you want.

super kind prof who does his best for his students to succeed. at first i will admit it was a bit difficult to follow with his explanations but he is very patient and willing to work with you until you understand. his test policies are reasonable and help you get a good grade

Dr. Mehri is an enthusiastic prof and you can tell that he loves what he specializes in. His lectures were informative, enlightening and fun. Assignments and exams were most relevant. He is kind and most patient and always willing to help.

Dr. Mehri is an enthusiastic prof and you can tell that he loves what he specializes in. If you're a heritage Persian speaker, but have little knowledge in reading and writing (which the entire course is based off), you will definitely struggle in this class because he just... doesn't teach. You'll usually get a paragraph to translate and that's it
